title: Designing Mathematics Pedagogy Considering Cultural Diversity in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education foundational knowledge and basic proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing and utilizing mathematics education content suitable for learners from diverse backgrounds, including multicultural students. Emphasizes practical approaches reflecting the post-COVID-19 educational environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more mathematics teaching strategies that reflect cultural differences in online learning environments.
Learners can develop two or more types of mathematics activity materials considering the socioeconomic backgrounds of multicultural learners.
Learners can design one mathematics education assessment tool that integrates cultural elements, even in resource-limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
